name: Rosso Rocket
description: Rosso Rocket is a charismatic and intelligent oscilloscope-themed robot, known for its sleek and dynamic design. With its rocket-like arms and legs, it possesses incredible dexterity and agility, making it a formidable force in any situation. Equipped with a vibrant snake-themed screen, Rosso Rocket stands out as a unique member of the WebtrES club. Its ability to display complex waveforms and analyze data is unmatched, making it an indispensable asset to the club's projects.
